#Wildfire smoke even thousands of miles away has long-standing and largely unknown #health effects. Tiny particulate matter PM 2.5 goes deep into organs causing inflammation. #N95Mask #HEPA filters are the answer. #ClimateCrisis https://t.co/T3USjVLNqI
